body.description: Sundu 1700W Steam Iron LED Screen with 4 Preset Settings Independent steam and temperature controls give you the ability to customize each setting separately for the best results across all fabric types. With the clear LED screen feature, you can easily select your fabric type and always iron with the right heat. Powerful Vertical Steam and 3 Steam Modes 3-Way Safety Auto-Off Self-Cleaning Function Ceramic Coated Soleplate and Anti-Scale Function 360-degree Pivot and Extra Long 8FT Cord Angled Precision Tip Perfect for Collars and Sleeves

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HASSLE-FREE IRONING EXPERIENCE STARTS NOW Sundu has been adhering to the concept of innovation, simplicity and comfort since its establishment. We will do our best to meet your ironing requirements. Every word is important to us. Sundu 1700W Steam Iron LED Screen with 4 Preset Settings Independent steam and temperature controls give you the ability to customize each setting separately for the best results across all fabric types. With the clear LED screen feature, you can easily select your fabric type and always iron with the right heat. Powerful Vertical Steam and 3 Steam Modes 3-Way Safety Auto-Off Self-Cleaning Function Ceramic Coated Soleplate and Anti-Scale Function 360-degree Pivot and Extra Long 8FT Cord Angled Precision Tip Perfect for Collars and Sleeves

Water Tank Capacity Comes with a measuring cup for easy refilling water. The water tank is 300ml (11 oz) and can be used for ironing multiple clothes. The clear water level line on the water tank lets you clearly see the state of use. 3-Way Auto Off Designed with a 3-Way shut-off, the iron shuts off when left unattended for 30 seconds on its side or soleplate and after 8 minutes on the heel rest. Easy To Carry The lightweight body allows you to use it at home and take it anywhere on the go without worrying about embarrassing folds when you go out.

Some Tips for A Better Experience: ✔️ The iron has four temperature levels, 1-2 for DRY IRONING and 3-4 for STEAM IRONING.✔️ In order to prolong the service life of the product and have a high-quality product experience, it is recommended that you add DISTILLED WATER to the water tank.✔️ In order to ensure the normal use of each product, we will test the product before leaving the factory, so there will be water droplets left in the water tank, which is a NORMAL phenomenon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best iron I've ever used. I'm not one that normally irons but had a coat & shorts that really needed it! I love the steam. It used the steam at the same time as the iron and viola! Deep wrinkles were gone just like that! It glides smooth and didn't burn/melt my coat! The 1st one did drip so I've ordered a replacement. If that one drips too, I'll update the review!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the size
reviews.reviewText: It is using for ironing. I rally like the size of this iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t been lucky with irons so I was nervous about ordering this iron. But I can honestly say it is a nice iron. Perfect weight and heat. Easy to add water for steam. I got compliments from fellow quilters at camp. I only gave 4 stars because it is hard to see the water level in the smoky glass tank. But I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect iron must have
reviews.reviewText: Update: after the company saw my review they reached out to me and apologized for the inconvenience, this company has gone above and beyond to make sure I was 100% satisfied. They reshipped me a new iron and it was a hundred percent different. this one glided so easily across the clothes it was like silk. It heated quickly and got every wrinkle out of my shirt very quickly one swipe and like magic the wrinkle was gone. They have continued to keep in touch with me to make sure my experience was perfect. Which it was. I’m so happy with this iron. the led screen is a nice touch. The tip of the iron is pointy allowing for easy access to wrinkles in between buttons. The steam amount is plenty enough for me. You can even hit the button for a quick blast of added steam. The iron did not leak. It comes with a cup to help you easily measure and pour water into the top of it. Which if you don’t put a bunch of water in there the iron won’t be heavy. One warning with that, pour slow. Or you’ll end up like me dumping water everywhere the hole is a little small so the water don’t go down as fast as I was pouring it out. Which doesn’t really bother me. The iron itself has a self cleaning button you can push to have the iron clean itself. It also has a button to spray a mist of water to your garmet if needed. The amount of steam is also easy enough to control and change to your liking you just spin the dial in the center of the iron.. the customer service is amazing. Thank you so much for helping me get a great iron.Had to return came scratched. It did not glide across my clothes which is important to me. Kinda just stuck there. Return process was granted. It did get hot just wasn’t easy to push around on my shirts. Kinda heavy for me. And the scratches on the bottom plate was a deal breaker to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this iron. Powerful steam. Not heavy. Auto turn off n self cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my purchase. The iron operates as stated. It meets all my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace our old iron that we’ve had for years and felt confident that it was a good pick. I wish I had been a bit more thorough in reading the reviews, particularly the ones referring to the leaking, because it shot water, and I mean SHOT water out of the steam holes. Water went everywhere and it not only soaked the ironing board, but all over the floor as well. You can see parts of the iron where water has leaked and it can’t be from overuse because we only used it twice. It damaged my shelf where it was sitting as well, even though we emptied all of the water out of the well. At first I thought it was dust, but when I saw that the edges of the shelf had lifted I could see that it was damaged from the water from the iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sundu Iron is amazing
reviews.reviewText: This iron is very lightweight and very easy to use. It gets hot fast and that helps my clothes when ironing out my garments.
